name: The Adventures of Dorothy on the Yellow Brick Planet
name_original: The Adventures of Dorothy on the Yellow Brick Planet
description:
Control Dorothy as she battles the Space babies  Munchkins on the yellow brick planet in her quest to get back home.

Programming - Paul Skeates

Art and Design - John Bayly

Sound Engineer - Jonathan Skeates

Controls:

Spacebar - Attack

E - Special

W - UP

S - Down

D - Right

A - Left

Also compatible with xbox 360 controller
